overview:
Dr. Crockett has more than 15 years of commercial experience in the pharma-biotech sector with particular expertise with inâ€“licensing and out-licensing, early-stage R&D collaborations, medical devices, company financing and acquisitions and a very highly respected worldwide network of industry and academic contacts.

As Commercial Director at Astex Therapeutics, he was responsible for more than 13 major collaboration and licensing deals in a period of four years.

To date he has executed more than 25 major, in- and out-licensing deals and has completed several company merger and acquisitions.
